basic.description:
A study of representative literary works of the 15th and 16th centuries, including Villon, Montaigne, Rabelais. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Littérature française de la Renaissance

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite       (FREN230 and FREN241) or FREN221 or (FREN212 and FREN220).
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from FREN315 or FREN405.
